entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:33 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain changing to rain mixed with snow near midnight then to flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
